title: Giveaways on stream + 1v1 tourney (competitors selected on stream $25 rp to the winner)
body:
Hey guys

A mod of mine posted here a few days ago letting people know about my stream and what we have planned for today, so here is a more detailed post about the events to come.

At 4pm QLD time we will be streaming viewer games ect until around 6pm.
At 6pm we will be selecting 8 people (through a random selector) to compete in a 1v1 tourney.

There will be TWO $10 rp giveaways during the stream and 1x$25 for the winner of the 1v1s
One $10 rp card will be given out before the tourney (around 5ish)
And the other will be given out during the tourney (in between games)

The giveaways and the selection of the competitors will be done the same way,
The stream uses Deepbot that allows a currency to be used within the stream (most of you might know this)
The way the currency is earned is written below the stream so feel free to head over and have a read.

When entering for a chance to play in the 1v1s everyone enters a token (the cap will be 1 per person to make sure it’s fair)
And we shall draw the 8 people’s names that way.

The 2x$10 rp cards will be drawn the same way however they will have 100 token caps (more you enter higher chance you have to win)

I can’t wait to get this started, hope to see some of you there! <3

Duckyy {{champion:34}} 

[twitch.tv/mrduckenstein](http://www.twitch.tv/mrduckenstein)

*note normal 1v1 rules apply (map = SR)

replies.body: Not long left until go time! :D
Not sure why it wouldn't let me add the stream in as a thumbnail like last post but its better than nothing!
It sure was :D had a great response from all the guys that came and watched so we will definitely be doing it again :)
How come every time I post the person who replies has the same FEK avatar as me?

Great stream! 
Hopefully I can get into the tournament :D
It was amazing, good job hosting that tourny Duckyy had fun just watching it
